column2: Extremely large tumor sitting on top of head. Heavy enough to severy affect the left eye (can't open).
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Tumor spanned over left orbital cavity.
The top of the skull cavity was enveloped in the tumor. The brain appeared to have one small met upon visual inspection.
The H&L looked alright. Possible met on the lung.
A tumor chunk was taken for preservation.
